title: Take Veigar's Event Horizon, make it permanent until someone's CC'd
body: and you get {{champion:51}} ...except that you get headshot for 1K

replies.body:
Except event horizon is huge and can be dropped around someone, while cait traps have an arm time, are tiny, visible and easily avoidable.

Stop blind facechecking brush.
any siege situation is what im getting at
This is the biggest stretch I've ever read in my life.
